title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 82.6 - Boilers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 82.6 - Boilers

State Regulations
A non-refundable fee of $100, payable to the Commissioner
of Labor, shall accompany each application to take the National Board of Boiler
and Pressure Vessel Inspectors quarterly exam, administered by the

Department. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
82.6

Amended

New

York State Register July 8, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 27, eff. 7/8/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
